column4: Hi guys, anyone know how to restart mysql from the command line? I'm ssh'd into a server where I'm having big issues restarting mysql
I have root. I am getting this error. "NEW SGAC [10:51:55] ~ # service mysql start   start: Job failed to start " I have googled it, but the internets don't have a very good answer for me
NEW SGAC [10:52:03] ~ # service mysql status mysql stop/waiting
